alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 4:35PM PST until February 25 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 1200 FEET... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow expected through this evening, with a dusting to 2 inch accumulations for foothill elevations above 1200 feet, especially communities across the 210 corridor. There is also a chance that snow could mix down as low as 1000 feet, but no accumulations are expected at that elevation. * WHERE...Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially across Highways the 118 and 210 corridors.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
